column1: Master in Electrical Engineering : Smart Integrated Systems
column5: SIS (Smart Integrated Systems) is an EIPHI graduate School Master focusing on Research & Innovation in the field of Mechatronic, Micro and Embedded systems.The Master SIS student will be working in Mimento, the Micro/nanotechnology center of the FEMTO-ST institute, an 865m²state-of-the-art cleanroom and one of the 5 cleanrooms in the French technological platforms network. Designed for R&D engineer positions in big international companies or smaller High-Tech industries, this degree can also be the springboard for a career as Researcher or Professor.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
